result.reason: Application crashes immediately on startup, indicating a critical unhandled exception during initialization that prevents normal operation.
result.approach: Debug the application's startup sequence, focusing on the ProgramRoot.cs Main method and the FrmMain loading process, to identify the source of the unhandled exception. This will likely involve stepping through the code, inspecting configuration loading, and checking dependency initializations.
